crown.name: CSK_Module_MultiDeepLearning
crown.desc: This is an automatically generated CROWN (description not necessary).

crown.name: CSK_MultiDeepLearning
crown.desc: Module to provide DeepLearning functionality. Multiple instances can be created and will run in multiple threads on the device. + This module provides a UI for most relevant features. + {empty} + Typically to configure this module to work with other modules you should do this: + {empty} + 1) If multiple instances are needed, these can be added via addInstance() + 2) Select the interface you want to configur via setInstance() + 3) Set the event providing the images to be processed e.g. via setRegisterEvent('CSK_ImagePlayer.OnNewImage') + 4) Other modules can react on the results of this module (see OnNewResultNUM and OnNewFullResultWithImageNUM) +

event.name: OnNewModelList
event.desc: Notify list of available models.

event.name: OnNewSelectedModel
event.desc: Notify currently selected DNN model.

event.name: OnNewModelFilename
event.desc: Notify currently set model filename.

event.name: OnNewModelLabels
event.desc: Notify labels of the currently set model.

event.name: OnNewMeasuredClassNUM
event.desc: Example of dynamically created event to notify measured class of instance. + NUM will be replaced by the number of instance (e.g. "OnNewMeasuredClass1"). + INFO: Other modules can check via "Script.isServedAsEvent" if event of sepecific instance exists.

event.name: OnNewMeasuredScoreNUM
event.desc: Example of dynamically created event to notify measured score of instance. + NUM will be replaced by the number of instance (e.g. "OnNewMeasuredScore1"). + INFO: Other modules can check via "Script.isServedAsEvent" if event of sepecific instance exists.

event.name: OnNewResultNUM
event.desc: Example of dynamically created event to notify result if the class for this instance was determined with the necessary score. + NUM will be replaced by the number of instance (e.g. "OnNewResult1"). + INFO: Other modules can check via "Script.isServedAsEvent" if event of sepecific instance exists.

event.name: OnNewValidScore
event.desc: Notify currently set score to be valid.

event.name: OnNewStatusShowImage
event.desc: Notify status if image should be shown in UI viewer of this module.

event.name: OnNewSelectedInstance
event.desc: Notify selected instance.

event.name: OnNewImageProcessingParameter
event.desc: Event to share processing parameters to the instances.

param.desc: Number of the instance to receive the parameter.
param.name: instanceNo

event.name: OnNewMeasuredClass
event.desc: Notify measured class of currently selected instance.

event.name: OnNewMeasuredScore
event.desc: Notify measured score of currently selected instance.

event.name: OnNewResult
event.desc: Notify result of currently selected instance.

event.name: TestImage
event.desc: Internal test event to provide an image to process (as an example).

event.name: OnPersistentDataModuleAvailable
event.desc: Notify status if features of CSK_PersistentData module are available.

event.name: OnNewStatusLoadParameterOnReboot
event.desc: Notify status if parameters should be loaded on app/device boot up.

event.name: OnDataLoadedOnReboot
event.desc: Event to call if module tried to load parameters and should be ready.

event.name: OnNewUploadPath
event.desc: Notify upload path for the models.

event.name: OnNewInstanceList
event.desc: Notify list of created instances.

event.name: OnUserLevelOperatorActive
event.desc: Status of Operator userlevel. Used internally in combination with the CSK_UserManagement module if available.

event.name: OnUserLevelMaintenanceActive
event.desc: Status of Maintenance userlevel. Used internally in combination with the CSK_UserManagement module if available.

event.name: OnUserLevelServiceActive
event.desc: Status of Service userlevel. Used internally in combination with the CSK_UserManagement module if available.

event.name: OnUserLevelAdminActive
event.desc: Status of Admin userlevel. Used internally in combination with the CSK_UserManagement module if available.

event.name: OnNewValueToForwardNUM
event.desc: Example of dynamically created event to Forward thread internal values to e.g. be notified with single event related to UI. + NUM will be replaced by the number of instance (e.g. "OnNewValueToForward1"). + INFO: Other modules can check via "Script.isServedAsEvent" if event of sepecific instance exists.

event.name: OnNewParameterName
event.desc: Notify name of the parameters if saved/loaded via the CSK_PersistentData module for currently selected camera instance.

event.name: OnNewNumberOfInstances
event.desc: Notifies about the number of instances.

event.name: OnNewStatusRegisteredEvent
event.desc: Notify event instance is registered to receive new image to process.

event.name: OnNewStatusForwardImage
event.desc: Notify if image should be forwarded with result.

event.name: OnNewViewerID
event.desc: Notify currently used viewerID (e.g. to show correct viewer in UI).

event.name: OnNewFullResultWithImageNUM
event.desc: Example of dynamically created event to notify measured result incl. class name and score of instance incl. the image. + NUM will be replaced by the number of instance (e.g. "OnNewResultWithImage1"). + Check "setProcessWithScores" regarding result configuration (single or multiple result). + INFO: Other modules can check via "Script.isServedAsEvent" if event of sepecific instance exists.

event.name: OnNewStatusProcessWithScores
event.desc: Notify if the scores for all classes should be returned in the processing result.

event.name: OnNewStatusSortResultByIndex
event.desc: Notify if the processing result should be sorted by class index instead of highest score.

event.name: OnNewStatusFlowConfigPriority
event.desc: Notify if FlowConfig should have priority for FlowConfig relevant configurations.

event.name: OnNewStatusCSKStyle
event.desc: Notify UI style to use for CSK modules.

event.name: OnNewStatusModuleVersion
event.desc: Notify version of module.

event.name: OnNewStatusModuleIsActive
event.desc: Notify if module can be used on device.

function.name: pageCalled
function.desc: Function to register "OnResume" of the module UI (only as helper function).

return.desc: Empty string (only needed to simplify binding).
return.name: empty

function.name: uploadFinished
function.desc: Upload of models to device finished.

function.name: setModelByName
function.desc: Set DNN model to use.

function.name: downloadFromDevice
function.desc: Download models from device.

function.name: setValidScore
function.desc: Set the value of a score to be a valid result.

function.name: setViewerActive
function.desc: Set if viewer on UI should display the image.

function.name: processImageNUM
function.desc: Example of dynamically served function to process DNN on an image. + NUM will be replaced by the number of instance (e.g. "processImage1"). + INFO: Other modules can check via "Script.isServedAsFunction" if function of sepecific instance exists. + Needs then to be called via "Script.callFunction()" (INFO: By using this, the first return value is just the "success" of this callFunction(), see AppEngine docu) +

function.name: sendParameters
function.desc: Send parameters to CSK_PersistentData module if possible to save them.

param.desc: [Optional] Set to TRUE if the data should NOT be saved immediately after sending.
param.name: noDataSave

function.name: setParameterName
function.desc: Function to set the name of the parameters if saved/loaded via the CSK_PersistentData module.

function.name: setRegisterEvent
function.desc: Set event to listen for incoming images to process. Will be set for currently selected instance (see "setInstance").

function.name: setLoadOnReboot
function.desc: Configure if this module should load its saved parameters at app/device boot up.

function.name: getInstancesAmount
function.desc: Get amount of created DeepLearning instances.

function.name: processImageWithScoresNUM
function.desc: Example of dynamically served function to process DNN on an image and return the scores for each class. + NUM will be replaced by the number of instance (e.g. "processImageWithScores1"). + INFO: Other modules can check via "Script.isServedAsFunction" if function of sepecific instance exists. + Needs then to be called via "Script.callFunction()" (INFO: By using this, the first return value is just the "success" of this callFunction(), see AppEngine docu). +

param.desc: Sort results by descending score instead of class number.
param.name: sorted

return.desc: Scores for each class as array (sorted by class number per default).
return.name: score

return.desc: Names of each class as a table (sorted by class number per default).
return.name: class

function.name: addInstance
function.desc: Function to add an additional deepLearning instance.

function.name: resetInstances
function.desc: Function to reset instances to one single instance. + IMPORTANT: As instances start their own threads, the module needs to be restarted if new instances are needed... (see AppEngine docu for "Script.startScript").

function.name: setInstance
function.desc: Set instance to select.

function.name: setForwardImage
function.desc: Functin to set if the image incl. result should be forwarded after processing.

function.name: setProcessWithScores
function.desc: Function to set if the scores for all classes should be returned in the processing result.

return.desc: Status if it was possible to configure.
return.name: success

function.name: setSortResultByIndex
function.desc: Function to set if the processing result should be sorted by class index instead of highest score.

function.name: setFlowConfigPriority
function.desc: Function to configure if FlowConfig should have priority for FlowConfig relevant configuration.

function.name: clearFlowConfigRelevantConfiguration
function.desc: Function to clear FlowConfig relevant configurations.

function.name: getStatusModuleActive
function.desc: Function to get status if module is active.

function.name: loadParameters
function.desc: Load parameters for this module from the CSK_PersistentData module if possible and use them.

function.name: getParameters
function.desc: Function to get all parameters of the client in JSON format.

param.desc: Number of instance to get parameters from.
param.name: instanceNo

function.name: resetModule
function.desc: Function to reset main configuration of module.

crown.name: MultiDeepLearning_FC
crown.desc: Crown to provide CSK_FlowConfig relevant features.

item.desc: Boolean if class was measured with necessary score (see 'CSK_MultiDeepLearning.OnNewResult[InstanceNUM]').
item.name: CLASS_VALID

crown.name: ImageSource
crown.desc: Set source of images to process.

function.name: create
function.desc: Internally used CSK_FlowConfig create function.

param.desc: Numeric identifier of processing instance (must be >=1).
param.name: Instance

return.desc: Handle to internally used FlowConfig instance.
return.name: handle

function.name: imageSource
function.desc: Set source of images to process.

param.desc: Handle to internally used FlowConfig instance.
param.name: handle

param.desc:
Set source of images to process.
Parameter: 1: image (IMAGE)
param.name: imageSource

event.name: OnNewResult
event.desc: Provide result of classification.

param.desc: Handle to internally used FlowConfig instance.
param.name: handle

param.desc:
'CSK_MultiDeepLearning.OnNewResult[InstanceNUM]' or 'CSK_MultiDeepLearning.OnNewMeasuredClass[InstanceNUM]'
Parameter: 1: Result if class was determined with necessary score (BOOL) if MODE = 'CLASS_VALID' or measured class (STRING) if MODE = 'CLASS'
param.name: OnNewResult

function.name: create
function.desc: Internally used CSK_FlowConfig create function.

param.desc: Numeric identifier of processing instance (must be >=1).
param.name: Instance

param.desc:
Mode of result to provide.
'CLASS' = Measured class
'CLASS_VALID' = Class was measured with necessary score
param.name: Mode

return.desc: Handle to internally used FlowConfig instance.
return.name: handle

function.name: register
function.desc: Internally used CSK_FlowConfig register function.

param.desc: Handle to internally used FlowConfig instance.
param.name: handle

crown.name: Process
crown.desc: Set source of images to process and provide classification result.

function.name: create
function.desc: Internally used CSK_FlowConfig create function.

param.desc: Numeric identifier of processing instance (must be >=1).
param.name: Instance

param.desc:
Mode of result to provide.
'CLASS' = Measured class
'CLASS_VALID' = Class was measured with necessary score
param.name: Mode

return.desc: Handle to internally used FlowConfig instance.
return.name: handle

function.name: process
function.desc: Set source of images to process and provide classification result.

param.desc: Handle to internally used FlowConfig instance.
param.name: handle

param.desc:
Set source of images to process.
Parameter: 1: image (IMAGE)
param.name: imageSource

return.desc:
'CSK_MultiDeepLearning.OnNewResult[InstanceNUM]' or 'CSK_MultiDeepLearning.OnNewMeasuredClass[InstanceNUM]'
Parameter: 1: Result if class was determined with necessary score (BOOL) if MODE = 'CLASS_VALID' or measured class (STRING) if MODE = 'CLASS'
return.name: OnNewResult
